name: @divineretro/tile

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && cp package.json dist/package.json && cd ./src && npx tsc && npm run cp-css
scripts.compile: npm run cp-css && cd ./src && npx tsc --watch
scripts.cp-css:
cd src && for file in $(find ./ -name '*.css')  
 do 
 cp ${file} ../dist/${file} 
 done

author: Divine Star Software
description: A library for building retro tile games with babylonjs.
